summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Neighborhoods, authorizing an interagency agreement to accept funds from King County for the purpose of disbursement in the area surrounding and affected by the temporary reactivation of the King County Department of Youth Services Alder Street facility; making reimbursable appropriations from the General Fund; and increasing the expenditure allowance for the Department of Neighborhoods; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
